title: Malargalai Pol Thangai Lyrics Pasamalar
stanzas:
Malargalai pol
thangai urangugiraal
annan vazha vaippaan
endru amaidhi kondaal (2)

kalaindhidum kanavugal
aval padaithaal
annan kaarpanai thaerinil
parandhu sendraan (2)

Maamani maaligai
maadhargal punnagai
mangala maedaiyin
pon vannam kandaan (2)

maavilai thoranam
aadida kandaan (2)
manamagan vandhu
nindru maalai
soodak kandaan.

kalaindhidum kanavugal
aval padaithaal
annan kaarpanai thaerinil
parandhu sendraan

Aasaiyin paadhaiyil
oadiya pen mayil
anbudan kaalgalil
panidhida kandaan. (2)

vaazhiya kanmani
vazhiya endraan
vanmazhai pol kangal
neeril aadak kandaan

kalaindhidum kanavugal
aval padaithaal
annan kaarpanai thaerinil
parandhu sendraan

poo manam kondaval
paal manam kandaal
pongidum thaaimaiyil
seiyuda nindraal (2)

maamanai paaradi
kanmani endraal
marumagal kangal
thammil maaman
dheivam kandaan.

Malargalai pol
thangai urangugiraal
annan vazha vaippaan
endru amaidhi kondaal

kalaindhidum kanavugal
aval padaithaal
annan kaarpanai thaerinil
parandhu sendraan.
